__TOC__

In order to achieve the goals of the web presence team the community members must be able to trust each other.

This document is a work in progress but outlines a few things necessary to build a foundation of trust.

* Personal enrichment is OK
* Personal gain is NOT OK
* Security is important - do not do anything to subvert security
* Responsibly report security problems
* Abide by the Ubuntu <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.com/community/conduct|Code of Conduct]]</nowiki>

This document will evolve, please stay posted
